name: Can We Stay?
description:
You and your fantastical sand castles are the only thing between your glistening parents and the mighty ocean. Keep'em dry, away from the tide.

(AWSD to move, mouse clicks to interact)

-----------------------------------------

Made for Global Game Jam 2017
